item.title: R extract line endpoints
item.author: mweber36@gmail.com (Marc Weber)
item.description: Extracting line end nodes in R I noticed the maptools package in R had a SpatialLinesMidPoints function but couldn’t find any other out of the box functions in any packages to extract line endpoints. So I modified SpatialLinesMidPoints slightly to do the job:
